The transportable shear baler has 2 independent remote controls, one for the shear and the other one for the traked vehicle: "2" is for safety, "2" is for ease of use; "2" is for not making mistakes, "2" is because 2 are the machines that make up the unit.

TAURUS REDLINE BRAVO the best friend of your hammer mill!!! https://www.taurusweb.it/en/redline-preshredders-and-hammers-mills/bravo/

üîß BRAVO: the pre-shredding solution that optimized hammer mill feeding

üí• The ‚ÄúRedripper BRAVO‚Äù, featuring counter-rotating horizontal shafts, is the pre-shredder specifically designed to handle bulky scrap, E.L.V., and compacted scrap bales before they enter the mill.

üëâ Installed upstream of the hammer mill, it ensures homogeneous, continuous, and safe feeding.

üìå Equipped with the patented OSD OVERSTROKE tilting feed chute, BRAVO:

‚Ä¢	Increases productivity

‚Ä¢	Facilitates the intake of large and bulky materials

‚öôÔ∏è Tangible benefits for metal scrap shredding and sorting plants:

‚Ä¢ Eliminates explosion risks in the grinding chamber

‚Ä¢ Reduces energy consumption

‚Ä¢ Extends the lifespan of hammers, grids, and wear plates

‚Ä¢ Prevents power surges and overloads

BRAVO boosts the performance of small and medium-sized plants, enabling them to process complex materials safely and efficiently.

üìû Want to learn more about how BRAVO can optimize your plant? Get in touch with us!  https://www.taurusweb.it/en/contact-us/

üîßTIME TESTINGüîß
The setting-up and testing of our TAURUS inclined shear is now complete! ‚úÖ

TR-VHD (Very Heavy Duty): very high capacity inclined shears, with cutting forces of up to 1800 tons, designed for continuous shearing of all types of scrap.
Ideal for processing profiles, pipes, pantograph sheets, mixed and bulky scrap, demolition materials, rails, rebar and more...

üî© Your hammer mill's best friend!

üëâ BRAVO is the pre-shredder designed exclusively for:
‚úÖ Uniforms the size

Compact and Versatile Shear Balers: the TAURUS ELLE Series 

üîß Power üîÑ Mobility üîù Efficiency

In the metal scrap recycling and processing industry, having a machine that‚Äôs both powerful and easy to transport makes all the difference. 
Our ELLE Series shear balers by TAURUS are the perfect solution for those who need maximum versatility without compromise.

‚úÖ From 750 to 950 tons of cutting force
‚úÖ Box sizes from 6.1 to 7.2 meters
‚úÖ Diesel engines up to 400 hp
‚úÖ 6 lifting cylinders (4 for lifting, 2 for extra stability)
‚úÖ Can be installed directly on the ground or on a semi-trailer
‚úÖ Remote control standard for fully wireless operation

üí° Equipped with smart features to boost productivity and precision:
üîπ Cutting economizer (standard)
üîπ Precision laser (standard) for accurate cutting alignment
üîπ Optional pre-loading system to reduce downtime and increase output

üí™ Built with Hardox steel, these machines ensure rugged durability and high performance, even in the most demanding environments.

üì© Contact us for more info info@taurusweb.it

üî© POWER, EFFICIENCY, RELIABILITY. ONE MACHINE: RAPID.üî©
A concentrate of strength, speed and robustness, designed for processing the toughest scrap such as: demolition, industrial scrap, moulding trimmings, pantograph sheets and much more.
RAPID shear balers are synonymous with:

‚úÖ High density
‚úÖ Low consumption
‚úÖ Maximum reliability

With monolithic construction, self-contained operation and no need for foundations, the RAPID is easy to install, move and above all... ready to work right out of the box.
üí™ The RAPID shear baler does more than just cut: it transforms the way you work.

üí™üí•CAT: The shear baler on a tracked vehicle.
The shear baler transportable on tracked vehicle is designed to follow you everywhere. You choose how and where to work, CAT follows you.

‚úî 2 for safety

With the TAURUS swing-wing compression system with OVERSTROKE on both lids.
